get.summary: Get plan benefit details of plans associated with the member.
get.description:
This API provides all of the plan information and the related benefit details of the plan to be displayed online for the user. 
The data returned in this API is used only as a static display and not used for any calculation or accumulations.
If any calculated values to be displayed, perform the calculation at the payer side and send it as a benefit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: unique identifier of the member to retrieve the list of benefits associated with the plan

parameters.name: plan_id
parameters.description: unique plan id for getting the benefits for a plan

parameters.name: effective_date
parameters.description: effective date of the member coverage. used to retrieve past, present and future plan benefit information where supported.

parameters.name: termination_date
parameters.description: termination date of the member coverage. this may not be needed as effective_date should be adequate to identify benefit period for past, present, future plan benefit information.

parameters.name: benefit_category
parameters.description: Category of the Benefit that the user is searching

200.description: An array of plan information objects

count.description: Count representing the number of objects returned in the results array

next.description: query identifier defined by the api developer for getting the next set of records

previous.description: query identifier defined by the api developer for getting the previous set of records
